comment._content:
Edith Yokell was the daughter of Alexander and Manya Gersen of Elizabethtown NY.  Here's Manya:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/jwacommons/3383138864/]

Stanley and Edith Yokell were living in Boulder, Colorado, in 2007, when Edith's sister Ruth died (according to Ruth's NYTimes obit).

comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: Where on earth did they get that much fabric for a wedding dress in 1944, was it not rationed in the US?  There must be most of a parachute there.
